lead_paragraph: New books by Sarah Manguso, Edward Mendelson, Donald Hall, Mohsin Hamid and Ander Monson.
snippet: New books by Sarah Manguso, Edward Mendelson, Donald Hall, Mohsin Hamid and Ander Monson.
abstract: Michelle Orange reviews books Ongoingness: The End of a Diary by Sarah Manguso, Moral Agents: Eight Twentieth-Century American Writers by Edward Mendelson, Essays After Eighty by Donald Hall, Discontent and Its Civilizations: Dispatches From Lahore, New York and London by Mohsin Hamid and Letter to a Future Lover: Marginalia, Errata, Secrets, Inscriptions, and Other Ephemera Found in Libraries by Ander Monson.
